add_modal.title: Add a new tag
add_modal.name: Name of the tag
add_modal.name_description: Define a name for your tag, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.
add_modal.color_description: Choose a color for your tag, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.

delete.title: Delete tag
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this tag?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone and the tag will be removed from all tags associated.

tasks.title: Tasks

folders.title: Folders
folders.delete_folder_description: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
folders.delete_folder_warning: This action cannot be undone and all the tasks will be unlinked
folders.name: Name of the folder
folders.name_description: Define a name for your folder, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.
folders.color_description: Choose a color for your folder, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.

tasks.nothing_to_do: Nothing to do for now, enjoy your day!
tasks.day_off: You have nothing planned for tomorrow, enjoy your day!

add_task_modal.task_title: What do you need to do?
add_task_modal.task_added_description: Your task has been added successfully.
add_task_modal.title_required_description: Please enter a title for your task
add_task_modal.when_would_you_like_to_be_reminded: When would you like to be reminded?
add_task_modal.when_would_you_like_the_task_to_start: When would you like the task to start?
add_task_modal.when_would_you_like_the_task_to_end: When would you like the task to end?

add_time_entry.title: Add a time entry
add_time_entry.description: Manually add a time entry for this task.

conflict_detected_modal.title: Conflict Detected
conflict_detected_modal.description: Previous edits of this task made while offline conflicts with the current version of the task.
conflict_detected_modal.warning: You can either resolve the conflicts now or come back later to resolve them.

errors.cannot_move_device_calendar_event: You cannot move a device calendar event
errors.cannot_move_habit_event: You cannot move a habit event
errors.cannot_resize_device_calendar_event: You cannot resize a device calendar event
errors.cannot_resize_habit_event: You cannot resize a habit event

habits.title: Habits
habits.get_started_now: Add your first habit to get started!

delete_habit.title: Delete habit
delete_habit.description: Are you sure you want to delete this habit?
delete_habit.warning: This action cannot be undone and all the related entries will also be deleted.

add.title: What do you want to achieve?
add.name: Habit name*
add.name_description: Define a name for your habit, this will help you remember what it is about and be shown in notifications.
add.citation_description: Add a citation to your habit, this will help you remember why you are doing it and motivate you.
add.citation_hint: “Water is the only drink for a wise man.” — Henry David Thoreau
add.when_would_you_like_the_habit_to_start: When would you like the habit to start?
add.when_would_you_like_the_habit_to_end: When would you like the habit to end?
add.number_of_times_description:
How many times do you want to do this habit?
Each time the frequency is reached, it will be reseted (for example, if you set it to 3 times and a daily frequency, you will have to do it 3 times a day).
add.days_of_week_description: On which days of the week do you want to do this habit?
add.reminders_description: Set a time for your reminders. You will be notified when the time is reached.
add.duration_description: How long do you want to do this habit?
add.days_of_week_mismatch: You must select the same number of days as the number of times
add.every_number_day_description: How many days do you want to wait before repeating this habit?
add.days_of_month_description: On which days of the month do you want to do this habit?

habit_detail.delete_habit_description: Are you sure you want to delete this habit?
habit_detail.delete_habit_warning: This action cannot be undone and all the related entries will also be deleted.
habit_detail.delete_entry_description: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

under_construction.title: We're working on it!
under_construction.description:
This feature is not yet available, but we're working hard to bring it to you soon.

Stay tuned!

notifications.habit_due_now: Perform the habit now, one less thing to do!

timer.title: Timer
timer.pomodoro_completed_message: Your pomodoro session has completed! Time for a break.
timer.stopwatch_completed_message: Your stopwatch session has been completed.

conflict_resolver.title: Conflict Resolver
conflict_resolver.choose_between: Choose between accepting or refusing the changes
